content.rendered:
Directed by Ajai Vasudev

Written by Aneesh Hameed. Bibin Mohan

Cast Mammootty (Devan). Meena (Lakshmi). V. Jayaprakash (Doctor). Siddique (Felix John). Raj Kiran (Ayyanar). Kalabhavan Shajohn (Prathapa Varma). John Vijay (Rangan). Raffi (Chacko). Binu Adimali (Production Control Saji). Arthana Binu (Poonkuzhali). Bibin George (Velmurugan). Hareesh Kanaran (Ganapathi). Baiju (Balakrishna Panikkar). Joy Badlani (Rubel Mohammed). Arjun Nandakumar (Ram). John Kaippallil (Adithya Varma). Ajai Vasudev (Siva). Alexander Prasanth (Kumar). Ambika Mohan (Ammal). Jaise Jose (Isaac). Jai Vishnu (Reporter Jai Vishnu). Marimuthu (Sithappa). Jay Vishnu (News Reporter 2). Raja Pollachi (Nattukoottam Gouder). K.C. Gokulan Pilassery (Gouder Brother). Sunny Kothangadan (Controller Assistant 2). Jewel (Tejal). Bijoi Edappally (Ragenth). Manu (ASI 2). Saheer (Raheem). Feby George (Agustine Kasurgode). Hamsa (Controller Assistant). Naseer (Police Constable). Nihad (News Reader 3). Nahas Nisamudeen (Gokul). Arun Raj (Aji Adimali). Shaji (SI 1). Jijo Koshi (Unnipallavoor). Augustin (Nattukoottam Gouder 2). Joy Arakkalam (Police Constable 2). Rajalakshmi (Chinnamma). Merlin (News Reader 4). Riyas (News Reporter 1). Sreeraj (News Reader 1). Vinod Ammaveedu (SI 2). Ragenthu (NattulootamGounder Son). Joel Jo George (Sithappa Son). Chankhis Khan (Bouncer 1). Noushad (Bouncer 2). Ramachandran (ASI 1). Bithul (News Reporter 3). Arun Prabha (Sudheer Puthankurush).Vijeesh Kumar. Vinu Chemmalakuzhy (Joyal Felix). Laya (Felix John’s Wife). Joban (ASI 3). Anil (News Reader 2)

Languages Malayalam

Production Goodwill Entertainment
